scenes.background: Monica looks relieved but Bob still seems uneasy.
scenes.description: I just hope this doesnt set a precedent for future tasks during your leave.

options.text: Let's focus on getting this done efficiently, and we can set clearer boundaries next time.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of efficiency while acknowledging the need for better future boundaries, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I understand your concern, Bob. We'll make sure this is an exception and not the norm.
options.analysis: You reassure Bob, showing good perception and empathy but could improve on self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I hear you, Bob. Let's handle this now and revisit our policies later.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's concern and suggest discussing policies later, showing good social skills but lower in motivation and self-regulation.
